snippet.title: FRAMEWORK: Found Footage - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
COMING SOON.


Explore "FRAMEWORK: Found Footage," the pinnacle of photorealistic horror gaming. Set in a VHS-filtered world of the backrooms and liminal spaces, this game redefines visual excellence in the open-world genre. Drawing inspiration from the atmospheric creations of Kane Pixels, FRAMEWORK delivers a bone-chilling adventure with unparalleled detail. Experience the terror and beauty of its hyper-realistic environments. Prepare to be captivated and frightened in equal measure. 

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/AdrianAfshar
